GSD.description:
dm ioctl: prevent potential spectre v1 gadget

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit dd86064417de828ff2102ddc6049c829bf7585b4. For more details please see the references link.
